SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_type, p.quantity FROM product p WHERE p.product_type IN ('부품', '반제품', '완제품')
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
ORDER BY p.product_id
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name FROM warehouse WHERE warehouse_status = 'Y' ORDER BY warehouse_name

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_type, wi.item_amount, w.warehouse_name, w.warehouse_id, wi.location_id FROM warehouse_item wi INNER JOIN product p ON wi.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wi.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} AND wi.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT p.product_id as productId, p.product_name as productName, p.product_type as productType, p.unit, p.spec, p.emp_id as empId, e.emp_name as empName, p.created_at as createdAt FROM product p LEFT JOIN employee e ON p.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE product_type = '부품'
AND (product_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR product_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
ORDER BY created_at DESC

AND product_type = #{productType}

mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_type = #{productType}, unit = #{unit}, price = #{price, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, emp_id = #{empId}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT emp_id as "empId", emp_name as "empName", emp_id || ' - ' || emp_name as "display" FROM employee ORDER BY emp_name

SELECT w.warehouse_id as "warehouseId", w.warehouse_name as "warehouseName", w.warehouse_type as "warehouseType", NVL(SUM(wi.item_amount), 0) as "itemAmount", COUNT(wi.location_id) as "locationCount" FROM warehouse w LEFT JOIN warehouse_item wi ON w.warehouse_id = wi.warehouse_id AND wi.product_id = #{productId} AND wi.use_yn = 'Y' WHERE w.warehouse_status = 'Y' GROUP BY w.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_name, w.warehouse_type HAVING w.warehouse_type = ( SELECT CASE WHEN product_type = '부품' THEN '원자재' WHEN product_type = '반제품' THEN '반제품' WHEN product_type = '완제품' THEN '완제품' END FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productId} ) ORDER BY w.warehouse_name
SELECT NVL(SUM(item_amount), 0) FROM warehouse_item WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT warehouse_id FROM warehouse WHERE warehouse_type = #{warehouseType} AND warehouse_status = 'Y' ORDER BY warehouse_id
